text: [Shishe wu] ying gei wei an la zhidao [luxing shi] bei kun de qiongren, tamen buneng zai da dishang mousheng. Youyu qianxu, bu renshi tamen de ren yiwei tamen shi fuyu de. Ni keyi genju tamen de waimao ren chu tamen, tamen bu yuan [disanxiasi de] xiang renmen qitao [zhu]. Fanshi nimen suo shishe de jiamei zhi wu, an la que shi quanzhi de.
